title: Assertion failure on armv7
body:
Quick and easy reproduction is to run vttest and start with 1 (test of cursor movements). The failure is [here](https://github.com/alacritty/alacritty/blob/master/alacritty_terminal/src/grid/storage.rs#L159). I suspect this to be an issue on armv7 (32-bit) simply because I can't reproduce it on a similar x86_64 system. 

### System

OS: Linux
Version: alacritty 0.8.0-dev (7045a1e)
WM: sway (wayland)

### Logs

Full log: 
```
Created log file at "/tmp/Alacritty-19825.log"
```
